title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for: Two words and two translations are required for credit. Possible answers:

  • sperat/metuit (hopes/fears)

  • infestis/secundis (hostile/favorable)

  • reducit/summovet (brings back/removes)

Lexical (context-free) translations are acceptable.
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for: Two words and two translations are required for credit. Possible answers:

  • sperat/metuit (hopes/fears)

  • infestis/secundis (hostile/favorable)

  • reducit/summovet (brings back/removes)

Lexical (context-free) translations are acceptable.

The student response earns all of the following points:

1 point is earned for: Two words and two translations are required for credit. Possible answers:

  • sperat/metuit (hopes/fears)

  • infestis/secundis (hostile/favorable)

  • reducit/summovet (brings back/removes)

Lexical (context-free) translations are acceptable.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml: 1 point is earned for: The opposites represent extremes and the need for balance between them.
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for: The opposites represent extremes and the need for balance between them.
